pages.title: Skills & Abilities
pages.text: Accessible through the $(#033dfc)Vault Menu$(), you can unlock $(#033dfc)Skills$() that enhance your Vault running by adding $(#033dfc)unique capabilities$(), like $(#033dfc)Dashing$() in your facing direction, rapidly mining a $(#033dfc)massive amount of blocks$() or gaining $(#033dfc)Strength Effect Levels$().
To Unlock $(#033dfc)Talents & Abilities$(), you require $(#033dfc)Skill Points$(), which can either be obtained by $(#033dfc)Leveling up$() until LVL 200, or crafting $(#033dfc)Skill Orbs$().
Crafting $(#033dfc)Skill Orbs$()$(br2)$(#033dfc)Skill Essence$() can be found inside $(#033dfc)Vaults$() or purchased from $(#033dfc)Vendor Traders$().
